alcatelIND1NTPMIB.name: alcatelIND1NTPMIB

revisions.description: Fixed the Notifications to use MIB Module OID.0 as Notifications root.
The latest version of this MIB Module.

alcatelIND1NTPMIB.contactinfo: Please consult with Customer Service to ensure the most appropriate version of this document is used with the products in question: Alcatel-Lucent,Enterprise Solutions Division (Formerly Alcatel Internetworking, Incorporated) 26801 West Agoura Road Agoura Hills, CA 91301-5122 United States Of America Telephone: North America +1 800 995 2696 Latin America +1 877 919 9526 Europe +31 23 556 0100 Asia +65 394 7933 All Other +1 818 878 4507 Electronic Mail: support@ind.alcatel.com World Wide Web: http://alcatel-lucent.com/wps/portal/enterprise File Transfer Protocol: ftp://ftp.ind.alcatel.com/pub/products/mibs
alcatelIND1NTPMIB.description: This module describes an authoritative enterprise-specific Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Management Information Base (MIB): Propietary NTP MIB definitions The right to make changes in specification and other information contained in this document without prior notice is reserved. No liability shall be assumed for any incidental, indirect, special, or consequential damages whatsoever arising from or related to this document or the information contained herein. Vendors, end-users, and other interested parties are granted non-exclusive license to use this specification in connection with management of the products for which it is intended to be used. Copyright (C) 1995-2007 Alcatel-Lucent ALL RIGHTS RESERVED WORLDWIDE

alcatelIND1NTPMIBNotifications.name: alcatelIND1NTPMIBNotifications
alcatelIND1NTPMIBNotifications.description: Branch For NTP MIB Subsystem Notifications.

alcatelIND1NTPMIBObjects.name: alcatelIND1NTPMIBObjects
alcatelIND1NTPMIBObjects.description: Branch For NTP Subsystem Managed Objects.

alaIND1NtpMIBConformance.name: alaIND1NtpMIBConformance
alaIND1NtpMIBConformance.description: Branch For Ntp Subsystem Managed Objects.

alaIND1NtpMIBGroups.name: alaIND1NtpMIBGroups
alaIND1NtpMIBGroups.description: Branch For Ntp Subsystem Managed Objects.

alaIND1NtpMIBCompliances.name: alaIND1NtpMIBCompliances
alaIND1NtpMIBCompliances.description: Branch For Ntp Subsystem Managed Objects.

alaNtpPeerTable.name: alaNtpPeerTable
alaNtpPeerTable.description: Table containing the synchronization host this switch will be associated with.

alaNtpPeerEntry.name: alaNtpPeerEntry
alaNtpPeerEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

alaNtpPeerAddressType.name: alaNtpPeerAddressType
alaNtpPeerAddressType.description: The InetAddress type of the synchronization host. Only types InetAddressIPv4 (1) and InetAddressDNS (16) are supported.

alaNtpPeerAddress.name: alaNtpPeerAddress
alaNtpPeerAddress.description: The InetAddress of the synchronization host.

alaNtpPeerIpAddress.name: alaNtpPeerIpAddress
alaNtpPeerIpAddress.description: The IP address of the synchronization host derrived from the InetAddress.

alaNtpPeerType.name: alaNtpPeerType
alaNtpPeerType.description: Type of synchronization host that will communicate with this switch.

alaNtpPeerAuth.name: alaNtpPeerAuth
alaNtpPeerAuth.description: The authorization keyid for the remote host.

alaNtpPeerVersion.name: alaNtpPeerVersion
alaNtpPeerVersion.description: The NTP version to communicate with the remote host.

alaNtpPeerMinpoll.name: alaNtpPeerMinpoll
alaNtpPeerMinpoll.description: The minimum poll duration to the remote host. This value is a power of 2 seconds when the poll will occur. For example, 4 (2 to the power 4) is 16 seconds. The maximum poll value is 10.

alaNtpPeerPrefer.name: alaNtpPeerPrefer
alaNtpPeerPrefer.description: Marks the host as a preferred connection.

alaNtpPeerAdmin.name: alaNtpPeerAdmin
alaNtpPeerAdmin.description: Used in accordance to installation and removal conventions for conceptual rows. The RowStatus values that are supported are the following: active(1) - The row is active and valid. createAndGo(4) - The row will be created and activated. destroy(6) - The row will be destroyed.

alaNtpPeerName.name: alaNtpPeerName
alaNtpPeerName.description: The DNS name for the peer association derrived from the InetAddress.

alaNtpPeerStratum.name: alaNtpPeerStratum
alaNtpPeerStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer. If this number is 16, the remote peer has not been synchronized. This parameter can only be set with a LOCALCLOCK server.

alaNtpAuthDelay.name: alaNtpAuthDelay
alaNtpAuthDelay.description: This field sets a specified time interval that is added to timestamps included in requests to the server that required authentication. Typically this delay is needed in cases of long delay paths, or servers whose clocks are unsynchronized. Value is in milli-seconds

alaNtpBroadcastDelay.name: alaNtpBroadcastDelay
alaNtpBroadcastDelay.description: This field sets a specified time interval that is added to timestamps included in messages from broadcast servers. Value is in milli-seconds

alaNtpKeysFile.name: alaNtpKeysFile
alaNtpKeysFile.description: Name of the file which has the authorization keys.

alaNtpConfigReqKeyId.name: alaNtpConfigReqKeyId
alaNtpConfigReqKeyId.description: Request messages ask for information from the NTP entity such as timestamp information, statistics, etc. This changes the authentication key identifier for request messages sent from the switch to another NTP entity.

alaNtpConfigCtlKeyId.name: alaNtpConfigCtlKeyId
alaNtpConfigCtlKeyId.description: Control messages attempt to change the configuration of the NTP entity in some fashion. This changes the authentication key identifier for control messages sent from the switch to another NTP entity.

alaNtpConfigCfgKeyId.name: alaNtpConfigCfgKeyId
alaNtpConfigCfgKeyId.description: Configuration messages changes information on the NTP entity.

alaNtpPrecision.name: alaNtpPrecision
alaNtpPrecision.description: This sets the server's advertised precision.

alaNtpPeerTests.name: alaNtpPeerTests
alaNtpPeerTests.description: Enables/disable NTP peer synchronization tests. Disabling peer tests allows the NTP client to synchonize with servers that are themselves unsynchronized or would otherwise be eliminated by other time source tests.

alaNtpSysStratum.name: alaNtpSysStratum
alaNtpSysStratum.description: The stratum level of the local server. If this number is 16 it indicates that the switch is not synchronized. This helps the clients to select clocks with lower stratum number

alaNtpMaxAssociation.name: alaNtpMaxAssociation
alaNtpMaxAssociation.description: The maximum number of peer and client associations that the switch will serve. This helps ensure that the switch isn't overwhelmed by huge numbers of NTP synchronization requests

alaNtpAuthenticate.name: alaNtpAuthenticate
alaNtpAuthenticate.description: Enable/Disable authentication of the NTP requests on the switch

alaNtpPeerListTable.name: alaNtpPeerListTable
alaNtpPeerListTable.description: Used to display a brief list of all NTP associations related to this switch (servers, peers, etc.).

alaNtpPeerListEntry.name: alaNtpPeerListEntry
alaNtpPeerListEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one association.

alaNtpPeerListAddressType.name: alaNtpPeerListAddressType
alaNtpPeerListAddressType.description: The InetAddress type of the synchronization host. InetAddressIPv4 (1) is the only type currently supported.

alaNtpPeerListIpAddress.name: alaNtpPeerListIpAddress
alaNtpPeerListIpAddress.description: The IP address of the association.

alaNtpPeerListLocal.name: alaNtpPeerListLocal
alaNtpPeerListLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote association. If this address is 0.0.0.0, then the local address has yet to be determined.

alaNtpPeerListStratum.name: alaNtpPeerListStratum
alaNtpPeerListStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer. If this number is 16, the remote peer has not been synchronized.

alaNtpPeerListReach.name: alaNtpPeerListReach
alaNtpPeerListReach.description: The reachability register of the remote association, in octal format. This number is determined by the NTP algorithm.

alaNtpPeerListDelay.name: alaNtpPeerListDelay
alaNtpPeerListDelay.description: The currently estimated delay of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

alaNtpPeerListOffset.name: alaNtpPeerListOffset
alaNtpPeerListOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

alaNtpPeerListDispersion.name: alaNtpPeerListDispersion
alaNtpPeerListDispersion.description: The currently estimated dispersion of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

alaNtpPeerListSynced.name: alaNtpPeerListSynced
alaNtpPeerListSynced.description: Indicates that NTP is synchronized with this entity.

alaNtpPeerListName.name: alaNtpPeerListName
alaNtpPeerListName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

alaNtpInfoPeer.name: alaNtpInfoPeer
alaNtpInfoPeer.description: The IP address of the remote association.

alaNtpInfoMode.name: alaNtpInfoMode
alaNtpInfoMode.description: The peer mode of this remote association.

alaNtpInfoLeapIndicator.name: alaNtpInfoLeapIndicator
alaNtpInfoLeapIndicator.description: The status of leap second insertion for this association.

alaNtpInfoStratum.name: alaNtpInfoStratum
alaNtpInfoStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer. If this number is 16, the remote peer has not been synchronized.

alaNtpInfoPrecision.name: alaNtpInfoPrecision
alaNtpInfoPrecision.description: The advertised precision of the switch. It will be a number between -4 and -20.

alaNtpInfoDistance.name: alaNtpInfoDistance
alaNtpInfoDistance.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the total roundtrip delay to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

alaNtpInfoDispersion.name: alaNtpInfoDispersion
alaNtpInfoDispersion.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the maximum error relative to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

alaNtpInfoReferenceId.name: alaNtpInfoReferenceId
alaNtpInfoReferenceId.description: This is a 32-bit code identifying the particular reference clock. Can be an IP address.

alaNtpInfoReferenceTime.name: alaNtpInfoReferenceTime
alaNtpInfoReferenceTime.description: This is the local time at which the local clock was last set or corrected.

alaNtpInfoFrequency.name: alaNtpInfoFrequency
alaNtpInfoFrequency.description: A number determining the local clocks frequency in relation to a reference clock's Pulse per Second (PPS). If the clock is running in perfect synchronization, this number should be 1. Otherwise, it will be slightly lower or higher in order to compensate for the time difference.

alaNtpInfoStability.name: alaNtpInfoStability
alaNtpInfoStability.description: The stability of the clock in relation to a reference clock's Pulse per Second (PPS).

alaNtpInfoBroadcastDelay.name: alaNtpInfoBroadcastDelay
alaNtpInfoBroadcastDelay.description: The broadcast delay, in seconds, of this association.

alaNtpInfoAuthDelay.name: alaNtpInfoAuthDelay
alaNtpInfoAuthDelay.description: The authentication delay, in seconds, of this association.

alaNtpPeerShowTable.name: alaNtpPeerShowTable
alaNtpPeerShowTable.description: Used to display a brief list of all NTP associations related to this switch (servers, peers, etc.).

alaNtpPeerShowEntry.name: alaNtpPeerShowEntry
alaNtpPeerShowEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one association.

alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddressType.name: alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddressType
alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddressType.description: The InetAddress type of the synchronization host. InetAddressIPv4 (1) is the only type currently supported.

alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddress.name: alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddress
alaNtpPeerShowRemoteAddress.description: The InetAddress of the remote association.

alaNtpPeerShowRemoteIpAddress.name: alaNtpPeerShowRemoteIpAddress
alaNtpPeerShowRemoteIpAddress.description: The IP address of the remote association.

alaNtpPeerShowLocal.name: alaNtpPeerShowLocal
alaNtpPeerShowLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote associations.

alaNtpPeerShowHmode.name: alaNtpPeerShowHmode
alaNtpPeerShowHmode.description: The host mode of this remote association.

alaNtpPeerShowPmode.name: alaNtpPeerShowPmode
alaNtpPeerShowPmode.description: The peer mode of this remote association.

alaNtpPeerShowStratum.name: alaNtpPeerShowStratum
alaNtpPeerShowStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer.

alaNtpPeerShowPrecision.name: alaNtpPeerShowPrecision
alaNtpPeerShowPrecision.description: The advertised precision of this association, which is a number from -4 to -20.

alaNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator.name: alaNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator
alaNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator.description: The status of leap second insertion for this association.

alaNtpPeerShowReferenceId.name: alaNtpPeerShowReferenceId
alaNtpPeerShowReferenceId.description: This is a 32-bit code identifying the peers primary reference source. Normally an IP address.

alaNtpPeerShowRootDistance.name: alaNtpPeerShowRootDistance
alaNtpPeerShowRootDistance.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the total roundtrip delay to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowRootDispersion.name: alaNtpPeerShowRootDispersion
alaNtpPeerShowRootDispersion.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the maximum error relative to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowPpoll.name: alaNtpPeerShowPpoll
alaNtpPeerShowPpoll.description: The poll time for this association when it is a peer.

alaNtpPeerShowHpoll.name: alaNtpPeerShowHpoll
alaNtpPeerShowHpoll.description: The poll time for this association when it is a host.

alaNtpPeerShowKeyid.name: alaNtpPeerShowKeyid
alaNtpPeerShowKeyid.description: This is an integer identifying the cryptographic key used to generate the message authentication code.

alaNtpPeerShowVersion.name: alaNtpPeerShowVersion
alaNtpPeerShowVersion.description: What version of NTP this association is using.

alaNtpPeerShowAssociation.name: alaNtpPeerShowAssociation
alaNtpPeerShowAssociation.description: The number of seconds since this NTP entity was associated with the switch.

alaNtpPeerShowValid.name: alaNtpPeerShowValid
alaNtpPeerShowValid.description: This is an integer indicating the validity of current NTP system variables. The validity is made false if system variable are changed and a new peer sample under the changed configuration has not been received.

alaNtpPeerShowReach.name: alaNtpPeerShowReach
alaNtpPeerShowReach.description: This is a shift register used to determine the reachability status of this peer.

alaNtpPeerShowUnreach.name: alaNtpPeerShowUnreach
alaNtpPeerShowUnreach.description: The number of times this NTP entity was unreachable.

alaNtpPeerShowFlash.name: alaNtpPeerShowFlash
alaNtpPeerShowFlash.description: This bitmap reveals the state at the last grumble from the peer and are most handy for diagnosing problems. Duplicate packet: 0x0001 Bogus packet: 0x0002 Protocol unsynchronized: 0x0004 Access denied: 0x0008 Authentication failure: 0x0010 Peer clock unsynchronized: 0x0020 Peer stratum out: 0x0040 Root delay/dispersion bounds check: 0x0080 Peer delay dispersion bounds check: 0x0100 Autokey failed: 0x0200 Proventic not confirmed: 0x0400

alaNtpPeerShowTTL.name: alaNtpPeerShowTTL
alaNtpPeerShowTTL.description: This field displays the Time-to-Live (TTL) time in seconds and the mode (unicast, multicast, or broadcast) of NTP messages sent to a broadcast address.

alaNtpPeerShowTimer.name: alaNtpPeerShowTimer
alaNtpPeerShowTimer.description: The time to next poll in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowFlags.name: alaNtpPeerShowFlags
alaNtpPeerShowFlags.description: This details which flags have been configured for this peer. Association configured: 0x01 System peer: 0x02 Enabled for burst mode synchronization: 0x04 Reference clock: 0x08 Preferred server: 0x10 Authentable: 0x20 Synchronization candidate: 0x40 Synchronization candidates short-list: 0x80

alaNtpPeerShowReferenceTime.name: alaNtpPeerShowReferenceTime
alaNtpPeerShowReferenceTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, when the peer clock was last updated.

alaNtpPeerShowOriginateTime.name: alaNtpPeerShowOriginateTime
alaNtpPeerShowOriginateTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, of the peer when its latest NTP message was sent.

alaNtpPeerShowReceiveTime.name: alaNtpPeerShowReceiveTime
alaNtpPeerShowReceiveTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, when the latest NTP message from the peer arrived.

alaNtpPeerShowTransmitTime.name: alaNtpPeerShowTransmitTime
alaNtpPeerShowTransmitTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, at which the last NTP message was sent from this association.

alaNtpPeerShowOffset.name: alaNtpPeerShowOffset
alaNtpPeerShowOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowDelay.name: alaNtpPeerShowDelay
alaNtpPeerShowDelay.description: The currently estimated delay of this remote association, in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowDispersion.name: alaNtpPeerShowDispersion
alaNtpPeerShowDispersion.description: The currently estimated dispersion of this remote association, in seconds.

alaNtpPeerShowName.name: alaNtpPeerShowName
alaNtpPeerShowName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

alaNtpPeerShowStatus.name: alaNtpPeerShowStatus
alaNtpPeerShowStatus.description: Peer selection status: Bits 0 - 7 - Rejected due to high stratum and/or failed sanity checks: 1 - Designated falsticker by the intersection algorithm: 2 - Excess, culled from the end of the candidate list: 3 - Outlyer, discarded by the clustering algorithm: 4 - Candidate, included in the final selection set: 5 - Selected for synchronization; but distance exceeds maximum: 6 - Selected for synchronization: 7 - Selected for synchronization, PPS signal in use: 8 Peer association status: Bits 9 - 12 - Peer association configured: 9 - Peer authentication required: 10 - Last peer message authenticated: 11 - Peer reachable: 12

alaNtpStatsStatUptime.name: alaNtpStatsStatUptime
alaNtpStatsStatUptime.description: The number of seconds the local NTP server has been associated with the switch.

alaNtpStatsStatReset.name: alaNtpStatsStatReset
alaNtpStatsStatReset.description: The number of seconds since the last time the local NTP server has been restarted.

alaNtpStatsStatBadStratum.name: alaNtpStatsStatBadStratum
alaNtpStatsStatBadStratum.description: The number of NTP packets received that had a corrupted stratum bit in the data of the packet.

alaNtpStatsStatOldVersion.name: alaNtpStatsStatOldVersion
alaNtpStatsStatOldVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that were of an older version of NTP (either version 1 or 2).

alaNtpStatsStatNewVersion.name: alaNtpStatsStatNewVersion
alaNtpStatsStatNewVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that were version 3 of NTP.

alaNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion.name: alaNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion
alaNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that the version was unknown (most likely due to packet corruption).

alaNtpStatsStatBadLength.name: alaNtpStatsStatBadLength
alaNtpStatsStatBadLength.description: The number of NTP packets received that did not fit the NTP packet structure (most likely due to packet corruption).

alaNtpStatsStatProcessed.name: alaNtpStatsStatProcessed
alaNtpStatsStatProcessed.description: The total number of NTP packets processed.

alaNtpStatsStatBadAuth.name: alaNtpStatsStatBadAuth
alaNtpStatsStatBadAuth.description: The number of NTP packets rejected because they did not meet authentication standards.

alaNtpStatsStatLimitRejects.name: alaNtpStatsStatLimitRejects
alaNtpStatsStatLimitRejects.description: The number of NTP packets rejected because they did not meet authentication standards.

alaNtpStatsPeerTable.name: alaNtpStatsPeerTable
alaNtpStatsPeerTable.description: Table containing the synchronization host statistics.

alaNtpStatsPeerEntry.name: alaNtpStatsPeerEntry
alaNtpStatsPeerEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

alaNtpStatsPeerAddressType.name: alaNtpStatsPeerAddressType
alaNtpStatsPeerAddressType.description: The InetAddress type of the synchronization host. InetAddressIPv4 (1) is the only type currently supported.

alaNtpStatsPeerAddress.name: alaNtpStatsPeerAddress
alaNtpStatsPeerAddress.description: The InetAddress of the synchronization host.

alaNtpStatsPeerIpAddress.name: alaNtpStatsPeerIpAddress
alaNtpStatsPeerIpAddress.description: The IP address of the synchronization host.

alaNtpStatsPeerLocal.name: alaNtpStatsPeerLocal
alaNtpStatsPeerLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote association.

alaNtpStatsPeerLastRcv.name: alaNtpStatsPeerLastRcv
alaNtpStatsPeerLastRcv.description: The time since the last packet was received.

alaNtpStatsPeerNextSend.name: alaNtpStatsPeerNextSend
alaNtpStatsPeerNextSend.description: The time until the next packet is to be sent.

alaNtpStatsPeerReachChange.name: alaNtpStatsPeerReachChange
alaNtpStatsPeerReachChange.description: The time that the peer has been reachable.

alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent.name: alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent
alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent.description: The number of packets that have been sent.

alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd.name: alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd
alaNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd.description: The number of packets that have been received.

alaNtpStatsPeerBadAuth.name: alaNtpStatsPeerBadAuth
alaNtpStatsPeerBadAuth.description: The number of packets received with bad authentication.

alaNtpStatsPeerDuplicate.name: alaNtpStatsPeerDuplicate
alaNtpStatsPeerDuplicate.description: The number of duplicated packets received.

alaNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime.name: alaNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime
alaNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime.description: The number of bad reference times received.

alaNtpStatsPeerReset.name: alaNtpStatsPeerReset
alaNtpStatsPeerReset.description: The number of seconds since the statistics for this peer were last reset. Writing any value will reset the peer statistics.

alaNtpStatsPeerName.name: alaNtpStatsPeerName
alaNtpStatsPeerName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

alaNtpStatsLoopOffset.name: alaNtpStatsLoopOffset
alaNtpStatsLoopOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds. This counter indicates the offset of the peer clock relative to the local clock.

alaNtpStatsLoopFrequency.name: alaNtpStatsLoopFrequency
alaNtpStatsLoopFrequency.description: A number determining the local clocks frequency in relation to a reference clocks Pulse per Second (PPS). If the clock is running in perfect synchronization, this number should be 1. Otherwise, it will be slightly lower or higher in order to compensate for the time discrepancy between the reference clock and the local clock.

alaNtpStatsLoopWatchdog.name: alaNtpStatsLoopWatchdog
alaNtpStatsLoopWatchdog.description: Makes sure that NTP timer continues to run.

alaNtpStatsIoReset.name: alaNtpStatsIoReset
alaNtpStatsIoReset.description: The number of seconds since the last restart of NTP.

alaNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers.name: alaNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers
alaNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers.description: The number of switch receive buffers currently being used by this NTP entity.

alaNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers.name: alaNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers
alaNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers.description: The number of free receive buffers.

alaNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers.name: alaNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers
alaNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers.description: The number of receive buffers currently being used.

alaNtpStatsIoRefills.name: alaNtpStatsIoRefills
alaNtpStatsIoRefills.description: The number of times we added packets.

alaNtpStatsIoRcvPackets.name: alaNtpStatsIoRcvPackets
alaNtpStatsIoRcvPackets.description: The total number of NTP packets received by the switch.

alaNtpStatsIoSentPackets.name: alaNtpStatsIoSentPackets
alaNtpStatsIoSentPackets.description: The total number of NTP packets sent by the switch.

alaNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets.name: alaNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets
alaNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets.description: The number of NTP packets generated but not sent due to restrictions.

alaNtpStatsIoInterrupts.name: alaNtpStatsIoInterrupts
alaNtpStatsIoInterrupts.description: The number of times NTP information was interrupted in the process of transmitting or receiving.

alaNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv.name: alaNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv
alaNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv.description: The number of packets received by the interrupt handler.

alaNtpStatsReset.name: alaNtpStatsReset
alaNtpStatsReset.description: Resets the statistics counters for the following subsystems: 0x01 - all peers 0x02 - i/o 0x04 - system 0x08 - memory 0x10 - timer 0x20 - authentication 0x40 - control

alaNtpStatsMonitorTable.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorTable
alaNtpStatsMonitorTable.description: Table containing the association monitoring list.

alaNtpStatsMonitorEntry.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorEntry
alaNtpStatsMonitorEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

alaNtpStatsMonitorAddress.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorAddress
alaNtpStatsMonitorAddress.description: The IP address of the remote association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorPort.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorPort
alaNtpStatsMonitorPort.description: The IP port number of the association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress
alaNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress.description: The local IP address of the association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorCount.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorCount
alaNtpStatsMonitorCount.description: The number of NTP packets received from this association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorMode.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorMode
alaNtpStatsMonitorMode.description: The mode the NTP association uses in relation to the switch.

alaNtpStatsMonitorVersion.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorVersion
alaNtpStatsMonitorVersion.description: The version of NTP the association is using.

alaNtpStatsMonitorDrop.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorDrop
alaNtpStatsMonitorDrop.description: The number of NTP packets received from this association that were dropped.

alaNtpStatsMonitorLast.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorLast
alaNtpStatsMonitorLast.description: The number of seconds since the last NTP message has been received from this association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorFirst.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorFirst
alaNtpStatsMonitorFirst.description: The number of seconds since the first NTP message has been received from this association.

alaNtpStatsMonitorName.name: alaNtpStatsMonitorName
alaNtpStatsMonitorName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

alaNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId.name: alaNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId
alaNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId.description: Keyid of the key in the key file.

alaNtpAccessKeyIdTrust.name: alaNtpAccessKeyIdTrust
alaNtpAccessKeyIdTrust.description: The current state of trust of the table entry.

alaNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions.name: alaNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions
alaNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions.description: A mask indicating the restrictions to apply to the entry. 0x0001 - ignore, Ignore all packets from hosts. Can't use this on default (0.0.0.0). 0x0002 - noserve, Ignore NTP packets other than information queries and config-uration requests. 0x0004 - notrust, Treat these hosts normally in other respects, but never use them as synchronization sources. 0x0008 - noquery, Ignore all NTP information queries and configuration requests from the source. 0x0010 - nomodify, Ignore all NTP information queries and configuration requests that attempt to modify the state of the server. 0x0020 - nopeer, Provide stateless time service to polling hosts, but do not allocate peer memory resources to these hosts even if they otherwise might be considered useful as future synchronization partners. 0x0040 - notrap, Decline to provide control message trap service to matching hosts. 0x0080 - lowpriotrap, Declare traps set by matching hosts to be low priority. 0x0100 - limited, These hosts are subject to a limitation of the number of clients from the same net. 0x0200 - version. Serves only current version. 0x0400 - demobilize. A demobilization packet (kod) packet is sent.

alaNtpAccessRestrictedRowStatus.name: alaNtpAccessRestrictedRowStatus
alaNtpAccessRestrictedRowStatus.description: Used in accordance to installation and removal conventions for conceptual rows. The RowStatus values that are supported are the following: active(1) - The row is active and valid. createAndGo(4) - The row will be created and activated. destroy(6) - The row will be destroyed.

alaNtpAccessRereadKeyFile.name: alaNtpAccessRereadKeyFile
alaNtpAccessRereadKeyFile.description: Reloads the keyfile containing all currently existing keys into the alaNtpAccessKeyIdTable in the switch's memory. Reading this object will yield one of the three following values: inProgress(2), successful(3), failed(4) A value of inProgress means that table reload procedure is inProgress and not yet complete. A sucessful reply means the last attempted keyfile load completed successfully. A failed response indicates the last attempt to reload failed. Writing a value of 1 to this object initiates a reload of the table.
